Package fraction

Class Summary
Ratio For creating an object that can store a rational number.
RatioInput Class to calculate fractions with the help of the console the input must be int the format (-)XX(/(-)XX) (+|-|*|/) (-)XX(/(-)XX)
RatioMain This class is thought to be the starter class calling the input and operator objects.
RatioOperator Class includes several method to do mathwork on fractions.
RatioWriter Class gives a nice formated output for the RatioFramework
